contentrichtext.text: {{For|the fear of water|Aquaphobia}} {{Wiktionary}} '''Hydrophobia''' or '''hydrophobe''' may refer to: * [[Rabies]], especially a set of symptoms of the later stages of an infection, in which the victim has difficulty swallowing, shows panic when presented with liquids to drink, and can't quench its thirst * [[Hydrophobe]], a term used in chemistry to describe chemical "aversions" of a molecule, or part of a molecule, to water * ''Hydrophobia'', a Hungarian [[List of disk magazines#H|disk magazine]] (1996â€“1997) * ''[[Hydrophobia (video game)|Hydrophobia]]'', a video game developed by Dark Energy Digital {{disambig}}
